ygData.subject: RE: Oasis Warning
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea... so much for hunting in Oasis now.  Jeez.
ygData.messageBody:
Yea... so much for hunting in Oasis now. Jeez.


>Thanks for the info...
>
>Qanin SkyWanderer
>The Rathe 22nd Circle
>
> > ----------
> > From: Azor[SMTP:jmaynus@...]
> > Reply To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 11:52 AM
> > To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Oasis Warning
> >
> > From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> > I read on another post that with the new patch they did a few changes
>with
> > the Oasis.
> > This is what the post said
> >
> > "Ok new news on this one... if anyone has hunted there before you know
>the
> > typical problems of avoiding sand giant, spectres, and sometimes
> > Tarantualla
> > whatever his name is. Well they are chicken feed.
> >
> > As of patch we now have deepwater goblins. Shamans over 35+ with the
>wolf
> > pets running around the beach of Oasis. Are they aggressive? YES Are
>they
> > strong? HELL YES
> >
> > Last night I witnessed one clean the beach between 2nd and 1st rock,
>then
> > kill a SAND GIANT and go back to the water for a swim. Apparently the
>Gods
> > have decided they did not appreciate our camping along the beach. Party
> > time
> > is over.
> >
> > They also added cistern asps. No biggie probably 14th level or so."
> >
> > So if this is 100% true and you're around Lvl 35 or lower you might
>wanna
> > be
> > extra careful there.
> >
> > **************************
> > Azor
> > Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
> > **************************
